mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(icc.inspection_code_id AND icc.inspection_code_id=#{id} AND icc.del_flag=0 OR NULL) FROM inspection_code_content icc WHERE 1=1
select cs.major_name from cs_major cs where del_flag =0 and major_code = #{majorCode}
select name from device_type where del_flag =0 and code =#{deviceTypeCode}

SELECT sd.dict_name as text,sd.dict_code as value FROM sys_dict sd WHERE sd.del_flag=0
and sd.modules = #{modules}
